The world would be a lot quieter and less chaotic without the sounds and movements of animals.
The ecosystem would collapse, leading to a drastic change in the environment and the extinction of many plant species.

The loss of animals would have a significant impact on human mental health, as many people find comfort and companionship in pets and other animals.
